jobInfo.postDescription:
高中以上学历，机电相关专业
能吃苦，勤奋好学，服从安排，
工作内容：负责公司产品的测试，生产，研发。
jobInfo.address: 株洲天元区研发中心A座5楼505号

brandComInfo.introduce:
Hunan Stron Smart Co., Ltd  was founded in 2007. There are over 500 employees in our company including technical engineers, among that 100 people have professional title.  As the leading supplier of smart meters in China, we will keep developing new products and devote ourselves to be the intelligent product service provider. 
we have more than 10 million meters running in State Grid of China, which is the biggest utility in the world. Our production capacity is 8 million smart meters per year, and have a workshop only working for overseas’ order to guarantee the delivery time and quality control. 
Our main products including prepaid meters(prepaid energy meter, prepaid water meter, prepaid gas meter), PayGo solar home system and Vending software. We provide a full range of product production, technical support and after-sales services.Hunan Stron Smart Co., Ltd  was founded in 2007. There are over 500 employees in our company including technical engineers, among that 100 people have professional title.  As the leading supplier of smart meters in China, we will keep developing new products and devote ourselves to be the intelligent product service provider. 
we have more than 10 million meters running in State Grid of China, which is the biggest utility in the world. Our production capacity is 8 million smart meters per year, and have a workshop only working for overseas’ order to guarantee the delivery time and quality control. 
Our main products including prepaid meters(prepaid energy meter, prepaid water meter, prepaid gas meter), PayGo solar home system and Vending software. We provide a full range of product production, technical support and after-sales services.
